jsl.utilities.random.sp
Class TwoStateMarkovChain

java.lang.Object
  jsl.utilities.random.AbstractRandom
      jsl.utilities.random.sp.TwoStateMarkovChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
ControllableIfc, GetValueIfc, IdentityIfc, NewInstanceIfc, ParametersIfc, RandomIfc, RandomStreamIfc, SampleIfc, TwoStateMarkovChainIfc
public class TwoStateMarkovChain
extends AbstractRandom
implements TwoStateMarkovChainIfc

Represents a two state Markov chain States = {0,1} User supplies P{X(i) = 1| X(i-1) = 1} Probability of success after success P{X(i) = 1| X(i-1) = 0} Probability of success after failure

Author:
rossetti

resetStartStream

public void resetStartStream()
Description copied from interface: RandomStreamIfc
The resetStartStream method will position the RNG at the beginning of its stream. This is the same location in the stream as assigned when the RNG was created and initialized.

Specified by:
resetStartStream in interface RandomStreamIfc
